name: Cloak
description: Cloak is a cutting-edge Generative AI (GenAI) platform built on a decentralized infrastructure, prioritizing user privacy and data control. It democratizes access to AI technologies, ensuring users can leverage AI without compromising their privacy or security. Through its innovative roadmap, Cloak aims to become the leading Web3 GenAI platform, enhancing Web3 productivity through strategic partnerships, developer collaborations, and educational campaigns.
